memberdef.argsstring: (const int layers, const int sizex, const int sizey)
memberdef.name: PDE

briefdescription.para: Constructor for PDE object containing arbitrary number of planes.

detaileddescription.para:
layers
Number of PDE planes
sizex
horizontal size of PDE planes
sizey
vertical size of PDE planes
PRIVATE

briefdescription.para: Plots one layer of the PDE plane to a Graphics window.

parameterdescription.para: The PDE plane to be plotted. Default layer 0.

briefdescription.para: Plots one layer of the PDE to a Graphics window, but not over the cells.

parameterdescription.para: The PDE plane to be plotted. Default layer 0.

briefdescription.para: Plots the PDE field using contour lines.

parameterdescription.para: The PDE plane to be plotted. Default layer 0.
Color to use for the contour lines, as defined in the "default.ctb" color map file, which should be in the same directory as the executable. Default color 1 (black in the default color map).

briefdescription.para: Returns the horizontal size of the PDE planes.
Returns the vertical size of the PDE planes.
Returns the number of PDE layers in the PDE object.
Set the.

memberdef.argsstring: (const int layer, const int x, const int y) const
memberdef.name: Sigma

briefdescription.para: Returns the value of grid point x,y of PDE plane "layer".

memberdef.argsstring: (const int layer, const int x, const int y, const PDEFIELD_TYPE value)
memberdef.name: setValue

briefdescription.para: Sets grid point x,y of PDE plane "layer" to value "value".

memberdef.argsstring: (const int layer, const int x, const int y, const PDEFIELD_TYPE value)
memberdef.name: addtoValue

briefdescription.para: Adds a number to a PDE grid point.
Gets the maximum value of PDE layer l.
Returns the minimum value of PDE layer l.
Carry out $n$ diffusion steps for all PDE planes. We use a forward Euler method here. Can be replaced for better algorithm. Function for the Act model. The whole field is initialized, usually with 0.
Carry out $n$ diffusion steps for all PDE planes.

detaileddescription.para: We use a forward Euler method here. Can be replaced for better algorithm.

repeat
Number of steps.
Time step dt, space step dx, diffusion coefficient diff_coeff and boundary conditions (bool periodic_boundary) are set as global parameters in a parameter file using class Parameter.

briefdescription.para: Implementation of no-flux boundaries.
Implementation of absorbing boundaries.
Implementation of periodic boundaries. Called internally (optionally) by Diffuse().
Reaction and interaction of CPM plane with PDE planes.

parameterdescription.para: CellularPotts plane the PDE plane interacts with You should implement this member function as part of your main simulation code. See for an example vessel.cpp.

briefdescription.para: Returns cumulative "simulated" time, i.e. number of time steps * dt.
Returns summed amount of chemical in PDE plane "layer".

parameterdescription.para: The PDE plane of which to sum the chemicals. layer=-1 (default) returns the summed amount of chemical in all planes.

detaileddescription.para: Calculates the first and second order gradients, i.e. gradx, grady, gradxx, gradxy and gradyy and puts them in the next three chemical fields. Not currently used and might need some redoing. Make sure you have allocated sufficient fields (this method generates five planes).

parameterdescription.para: PDE plane of which to calculate the gradients (default 0)
first plane of five in which to write the results (default 1).

memberdef.argsstring: (Graphics &g, int stride, int linelength, int first_grad_layer=1)
memberdef.name: PlotVectorField

detaileddescription.para:
Plots a field of the first order gradients, i.e. gradx and grady; assumes you have called GradC before. Not currently used and might need some redoing.
g
Graphics window
stride
Number of grid points between vectors (drawn as lines, currently.
linelength
Length of vector lines, in pixels.
first_grad_layer
first plane of two which contain the calculated gradients (default 1).

memberdef.argsstring: (int x, int y, Graphics *graphics, int layer)
memberdef.name: plotPos

briefdescription.para: Used in Plot. Takes a color and turns it into a grey value.

parameterdescription.para: Value from PDE plane. Implement this function in you main simulation code. See e.g. vessel.cpp.

briefdescription.para: empty constructor (necessary for derivation)

memberdef.argsstring: (const int layers, const int sx, const int sy)
memberdef.name: AllocateSigma

briefdescription.para: Allocates a PDE plane (internal use). For internal use, can be reimplemented in derived class to change method of memory allocation.
